itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Black Stone Crystal that can be fused into Secondary Weapon sockets. 
Can only be obtained through the Black Spirit Quest.
- Item Effect: Max HP +100 & AP +5

※ This magic crystal has a high chance of shattering if your Character dies.

- Equipment can be transfused through Black Spirits.

item.name: Red Spirit Crystal
item.desc:
A Black Stone Crystal that can be fused into Sub-Weapons sockets. 
- Item effect: Maximum HP +100 & Attack +5 & Extra Damage against Humans +3
※ Once installed, the crystal might be destroyed upon the character's death.
- The potential of the crystal can be transfused to equipment items through Black Spirit.
- How to Obtain: Enter the Red Battlefield through Black Spirit and earn Red Seals through a fierce battle.
Exchange the Red Seals with Red Essence from Ornella in Heidel.
Heat the Red Essence and Crystal of Black Spirit together.
